name: Death end re;Quest
descr:
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/990050/extras/knowback550.gif?t=1730837404[/img][h2][b]Story[/b][/h2]

Arata Mizunashi, a video game programmer, receives a notification from an email sent to him by Shina Ninomiya, a colleague of his who went missing nearly one year ago. Together, they worked to create World’s Odyssey (W.O.D.), an immersive virtual landscape powered by breathtaking, state-of-the-art technology. That is, until Shina's sudden disappearance put a swift halt to production. Arata discovers the startling revelation that Shina Ninomiya was stuck inside of “W.O.D.” the whole time. When Arata delves hurriedly back into the lines of code haunting his forsaken project, he realizes that his game is now ravaged by an infestation of bugs, and that Shina is its only active player.

Arata soon learns that a nefarious force prevents him from extracting Shina out of the game. Her only way out? She must complete the game to unlock the perfect ending—an outcome with a success rate of 1%. On their journey, they encounter a slew of NPC characters that blur perceptions of humanity and A.I.-technology, setting into a motion a thrilling narrative that calls into question the differences between the virtual world and ours.

Little do they know what horrors await them on both sides of the screen...

[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/990050/extras/Install_600.gif?t=1730837404[/img][h2][b]Key Features[/b][/h2]

[b]Beyond Belief: Fact or Fiction?[/b] – Jump between reality and in-game modes, as players will need to investigate in the real world view to solve the mysterious inner-workings of the World Odyssey, and switch to an in-game view mode to battle against glitched-out monsters. Choose options wisely, as your decision can change the game’s ending!

[b]Turn-Based RPGs Flipped Upside Down[/b] – In this turn-based command battle system, you can roam freely and duke it out with fearsome monsters. During battle, players can change the game’s genre from a first-person shooter to even a fighting game!

[b]You’re Buggin’ Out [/b]– While exploring, players will need to activate character-specific dungeon skills to access hard-to-reach areas and hidden treasures!

[b]Follow the White Rabbit and Discover a Bug Infested World[/b] – In this hyper-realistic game world, players must help out Shina escape a game universe filled with infected bosses and mesmerizing environments!

[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/990050/extras/Celica_Glitch.gif?t=1730837404[/img]
detail:
名称: Death end re;Quest
类型: 动作, 冒险, 角色扮演
开发商: Idea Factory, Compile Heart
发行商: Idea Factory International
系列: Idea Factory International
发行日期: 2019 年 5 月 16 日
review: 全部评测: 多半好评 (968) - 此游戏的 968 篇用户评测中有 77% 为好评。
全部评测: 多半好评 (968 篇中的 77%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统 *: Windows 7 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
处理器: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: VRAM 1 GB or better graphics card that can support DirectX 12.0 or more
声卡: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
附注事项: Requires SSE4.2 compatible PC
推荐配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
处理器: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
内存: 8 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or better
声卡: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
附注事项: Requires SSE4.2 compatible PC
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
